metadata.Title: CVE-2016-8698 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the bm_readbody_bmp function in bitmap_io.cin potrace before 1.13 allows remote attackers to have unspecified impactvia a crafted BMP image, a different vulnerability than CVE-2016-8699,CVE-2016-8700, CVE-2016-8701, CVE-2016-8702, and CVE-2016-8703.

criterions.comment: potrace: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
